item.title: マレーシアの裁判所は、2021年に公開された映画「メンテガ・テルバン」によって故意に「他人の宗教的感情を傷つけた」として、地元の映画製作者2人を起訴した（ロイター）。
item.description:
Reuters:
A Malaysian court charges two local filmmakers for intentionally “wounding the religious feelings of others” via their Mentega Terbang movie, released in 2021  —  A Malaysian court on Wednesday charged two local filmmakers for intentionally “wounding the religious feelings of others” …

item.title: GTA 5』でマイケル・デ・サンタの声を担当したネッド・ルークが、AIチャットボットに自分の声を使用した件でWAMEを罵倒し、「人から金をむしり取ることはクールではない」と述べた（Will Nelson/PCGamesN）
item.description:
Will Nelson / PCGamesN:
Ned Luke, who voiced Michael De Santa in GTA 5, calls out WAME over using his voice in an AI chatbot, saying there is “nothing cool about ripping people off”  —  GTA 5 star Ned Luke has called out the use of his voice as part of an unofficial and now-removed Grand Theft Auto 5 AI chatbot from WAME.

item.title: ジェネレーティブAIは、著作権システムを圧迫する最新の技術革新に過ぎないが、著作権の法的構造全体を崩壊させるものになるかもしれない（Louis Menand/New Yorker）
item.description:
Louis Menand / New Yorker:
Generative AI is just the latest innovation to put pressure on the copyright system but might be the one that brings the whole legal structure of copyright down  —  Generative A.I. is the latest in a long line of innovations to put pressure on our already dysfunctional copyright system.

item.title: デビッド・スミスによるボルチモア・サン紙の買収は、シンクレアの政治的影響力や物議を醸す行動を考慮すると、同紙の将来について懸念を抱かせる（Joshua Benton/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Joshua Benton / Nieman Lab:
David Smith's purchase of The Baltimore Sun raises concerns about the paper's future, considering Sinclair's political influence and controversial actions  —  Its new owner, Sinclair executive chairman David D. Smith, has pushed local TV news hard to the right.

item.title: [スレッド】ボルチモア・サンの新オーナーは、スタッフとの会合で、9桁を支払い、新聞を4回読んだだけで、サンは利益を上げていると主張した（David Folkenflik/@davidfolkenflik）

item.title: ディズニーは、ペルツのTrian Fundが推薦したネルソン・ペルツとジェームズ・ラズロの推薦を支持せず、ブラックウェルズの推薦も支持しない（Jill Goldsmith/Deadline）
item.description:
Jill Goldsmith / Deadline:
Disney does not endorse the nominations of Nelson Peltz and James Rasulo put forth by Peltz's Trian Fund, nor does it endorse the nominations made by Blackwells  —  Disney CEO Bob Iger's compensation totaled about $31.6 million for the company fiscal year ended Sept. 30.  It includes most of the year.

item.title: ファイリングディズニーのボブ・アイガーCEOの報酬は、2023年には3160万ドルで、前年の2021年の4590万ドルから減少（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Filing: Disney CEO Bob Iger's compensation was $31.6M in 2023, down from $45.9M in 2021, his last prior full year of employment at the company  —  Disney CEO Bob Iger saw his compensation hit $31.6 million in 2023 — down from $45.9 million in 2021, his last prior full year of employment at the company.

item.title: ニールセン：エミー賞の視聴者数は前年比27％減の4.3Mで過去最小、過去6年で5度目の最低視聴者数を記録（Rick Porter/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Rick Porter / The Hollywood Reporter:
Nielsen: the Emmy Awards drew their smallest audience ever with 4.3M viewers, down 27% YoY, hitting a low in viewers for the fifth time in the past six years  —  Airing opposite an NFL playoff game and Iowa caucus coverage, the delayed ceremony tumbles again.

item.title: FilmLA：ハリウッドのストライキの中、ロサンゼルスの映画・TV制作は第4四半期に前年同期比36.4％減の5,520日となり、4四半期連続で減少した（Winston Cho/Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Winston Cho / Hollywood Reporter:
FilmLA: Los Angeles film and TV production fell 36.4% YoY to 5,520 shoot days in Q4 amid the Hollywood strikes, marking the fourth consecutive quarterly drop  —  The actors and writers strikes, combined with runaway production, led to some of the lowest production levels in the city's recorded history.

TelevisaUnivision plans to launch an ad-supported tier of its Spanish-language streamer, ViX, later in 2024 “at a lower price point with a moderate ad load”  —  TelevisaUnivision plans to launch an ad-supported version of its Spanish-language streamer, ViX, later in 2024 …

item.title: ディズニーと20世紀は、ストリーミング・サービスのサブスクリプション数を増やすために利益を留保し、自己売買を行ったとしてTSGから訴えられていたが、和解した（Winston Cho/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Winston Cho / The Hollywood Reporter:
Disney and 20th Century settle a lawsuit from TSG, which accused them of withholding profits and self-dealing to boost sub numbers for their streaming services  —  The lawsuit also dealt with changes in distribution windows and the allegedly murky role that studios play as producers and distributors of content.

item.title: 情報源：LATは、オーナーが編集上の決定に口出しすることと、CEO不在のビジョンの欠如に苦しんでいる。
item.description:
The Wrap:
Sources: the LAT suffers from its owner meddling in editorial decisions and from a lack of vision without a CEO; a former editor estimates it's losing $50M/year  —  Respected editor Kevin Merida abruptly resigned last week after getting fed up with owner interference in the newsroom
